tasks.label: Build MIDI2Synthesia
args: gcc src/main.c src/app.c src/input.c src/note.c src/render.c src/midi.c -Iincludes -I/usr/local/include/SDL3 -I/usr/local/include -D_REENTRANT -L/usr/local/lib -o build/midi2synthesia -lSDL3 -lSDL3_gfx -lSDL3_ttf -lportmidi -l:libsmf.a -g $(pkg-config --cflags --libs glib-2.0)
tasks.detail: Builds the MIDI2Synthesia project using SDL3, libsmf, and glib
